about_the_game:
Heroes of Legionwood: End of Days is the gripping finale of the Heroes of Legionwood saga.

You've saved Port Alexis from itself and gathered the Lore Shards. Now it is time to fight against the Darkness and decide the fate of the world.

After your triumph against your foes in Resurrection, the people of the land have united under your banner as a hero of Legionwood, ready to march against death itself. As you embark upon your final journey, you'll finally learn the true nature of your enemy and the tragic cost of victory. When the time comes, what will you choose to sacrifice?

Features

  • Import your character from Resurrection or begin anew with a level 20 character.
  • Discover how your decisions across the series will shape the land for years to come.
  • More non-linear quests and alternate solutions than ever before!
  • Advance your relationships with your companions to greater heights and even lower depths.
  • Decide the fate of the world in 3 different endings.
